com.paydiant.android.core.facade

Class LoyaltyManagerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.facade.SDKLoggingProvider
      • com.paydiant.android.core.facade.LoyaltyManagerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILoyaltyManagerFacade

    public class LoyaltyManagerFacade
extends SDKLoggingProvider
implements ILoyaltyManagerFacade
    This facade class provides the implementation required for the loyalty management.
    Since:
    3.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
